body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Since hdf5 1.10 is no longer preferred (commit https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/28091 from @haampie )
 and since constraint to hdf5@:1.10 in silo package is no longer enforced (commit https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27613 from @lrknox )
Silo does not compile any longer: 
$ spack install silo~mpi %gcc

